mapper.select: SELECT sa.user_address_id,sa.user_address_text, sa.user_address_phone, sa.user_address_area,sa.user_address_name,sa.user_address_default FROM shopping_address sa WHERE sa.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shopping_address(user_address_id, user_id,user_address_name, user_address_text, user_address_phone,user_address_area,user_address_default) VALUES (#{userAddressId},#{userId},#{userName}, #{userAddress},#{userPhone},#{userArea},#{userAddressDefault})
mapper.update:
UPDATE shopping_address
user_address_phone = #{userPhone},
user_address_area = #{userArea},
user_address_text = #{userAddress},
user_address_name = #{userName},
shopping_address.user_address_default = #{userAddressDefault}
WHERE user_address_id = #{userAddressId}
UPDATE shopping_address SET user_address_default = 1 WHERE user_address_id = (SELECT user_address_id FROM (SELECT user_address_id FROM shopping_address WHERE user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 0,1) temp)
